item.title: Monopoly GO: Today's Event Schedule & Best Strategy (January 15, 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Monopoly GO Events Schedule for January 15, 2025
  • Best Monopoly GO Strategy For January 15, 2025

With less than 48 hours left before the Jingle Joy album ends, Monopoly GO players are rushing to complete their albums and claim the grand prize. The Peg-E Sticker Drop is in full swing too, giving players one last chance to collect their missing stickers. Scopely has also come out with seasonal Wild Sticker deals for those who are just missing one or two stickers. In this guide, you can find a list of all the Monopoly GO events happening on January 15, 2025, and the best strategy to play today.

Monopoly GO Events Schedule for January 15, 2025

Monopoly Go has a jam-packed day of events on January 15, 2025. Check out the sections below for all the details.

All Monopoly GO events listed here are based on recent trends and are subject to change by Scopely at any time.

Best Monopoly GO Strategy For January 15, 2025

Catch the High Roller to progress through the top and sidebar events and grab as many Peg-E chips as you can for the Sticker Drop in Monopoly GO . If you have the cash, build during the Builder’s Bash and set your board up for the Wheel Boost and Cash Boost happening later today. Completing boards is a great way to reach the Bank of Monopoly, where you can open treasure vaults and claim different prizes.

You can replenish your cash reserves with the Cash Boost event and play during the Roll Match event to get a bunch of extra Dice Rolls.

item.title: Zayn Malik Shows Off Jaw-Dropping Last of Us Birthday Cake
item.description:
Summary

  • Zayn Malik celebrated his birthday with a realistic Clicker-shaped cake from The Last of Us.
  • Fans of the franchise have also created their own Infected-themed cakes, showcasing their love.
  • Kanye West and other celebrities have openly praised The Last of Us games, generating more buzz.

Celebrity musician Zayn Malik has shared his impressive birthday cake shaped like a Clicker from The Last of Us video game series. Like Malik, other The Last of Us fans have commissioned baked goods inspired by the popular franchise.

In the past, former One Direction member Zayn Malik has expressed how he is an avid gamer. In 2020, Zayn Malik collaborated with Harry Potter: Puzzles & Spells , a mobile puzzle game developed by Zynga. More recently, in August 2024, Malik was revealed to be the Shadow Duelist during the Yu-Gi-Oh! Master Duel livestream tournament, showing off his dedication and skills in the card game. Now, in another act of love towards video games, the superstar has celebrated his birthday with a The Last of Us -themed cake.

For his 32nd birthday on January 12, Zayn Malik commissioned a cake shaped like a Clicker from The Last of Us and shared it with his fans on social media. Clickers are one of the most terrifying enemies from The Last of Us , yet several fans find them ideal for bringing to life through cosplay, fan art, and more. It seems Zayn Malik also enjoys the Clicker's scary design enough to eat it. The cake was made with incredible attention to detail by Elizabeth Rowe, also known as The London Baker. Rowe is a renowned professional baker who once won first place on Netflix's Is It Cake? reality show, so it's no surprise the cake turned out so realistic. Aside from the Clicker's bust, the cake is also decorated with a wall covered in Cordyceps, a small field, and Malik's name.

Zayn Malik Shares Incredible Clicker-Shaped Cake Inspired by The Last of Us

Like Zayn Malik, other TLOU players have thought that cakes shaped like the Infected can be appetizing. One The Last of Us fan baked their own Clicker cake with chocolate icing and fondant. Another fan commissioned a birthday cake covered in Cordyceps and a replica of Joel's wristwatch on it. While the franchise has been around for over a decade, The Last of Us grew considerably in popularity thanks to HBO's live-action TV show. The series has confirmed the release of its highly anticipated second season in April 2025.

Zayn Malik is not the only celebrity who has openly talked about his fondness for The Last Of Us games. Earlier in January, major artist Kanye West praised The Last of Us 2 , saying it was the best game ever made. Sony has confirmed that The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered is landing on PC on April 3, 2025. However, players will require a PlayStation Network account, which has disappointed some fans.

item.title: The 17 Best Fashion Mods For Cyberpunk 2077
item.description:
Summary

  • The modding community for Cyberpunk 2077 has created a variety of clothing mods, including outfits from popular shows and characters like Lucy from the anime Edgerunners and Quiet from Metal Gear Solid.
  • Players can find mods that add cool accessories like hoods that don't hide the character's hair or cyberware gear inspired by the stylish Takemura.
  • There are also mods that offer more clothing options, such as casual and elegant dresses, skirts in various styles and lengths, and a collection of cool and casual outfits.

Cyberpunk 2077 is one of the greatest RPG games, with a campaign that sprawls across hours of fast-paced and exciting gameplay, set in the fictional neon world Night City. Players can tailor the player character known as V to their specifications, including their body build, gender, and appearance.

As such, one might expect for Cyberpunk to deliver on the fashion front, but the few good articles of clothing are few and far between, and those outfits usually don't have stats good enough to warrant wearing them over those ugly but powerful pieces of armor. Thankfully, Cyberpunk has a thriving modding community that is here to rescue the fashion-bereft players.

Updated on January 14, 2025, by Mara Cowley: The new year is upon us, and many might be starting new games, or returning to a few old favorites. Night City is always ready to welcome old and new faces alike, and what better way to spice up a playthrough than by adding in a few mods into the mix. When it comes to RPGs like Cyberpunk, everyone wants to play a good-looking character, and an easy way to do this is by decking out the player character in some truly fashionable or badass clothing. As such, this article has been updated to include even more Cyberpunk 2077 clothing mods to expand V's wardrobe.

1 Casual Style Outfit Part 20

Kick Back and Relax in Style

  • Mod Link
  • Author: VeegeeAlvarez

Even V needs a bit of downtime every now and then, to simply relax in their apartment or take a walk through the neon landscape of Night City. And what better to wear than some truly fashionable but comfortable fits, which players can download for their female V with this mod by Veegee.

The 20th part in an entire fashion series, this mod truly embodies the look of someone enjoying some long overdue R&R. And if players like the look of the simple yet fashionable looks available here, there are tons more fashion mods the author has created, so they can give their V a closet brimming with an impossible amount of choices.

2 Dave X Veegee Mustang Jacket Outfit

A Collection of Modern, Head-Turning Looks

  • Mod Link
  • Author: VeegeeAlvarez

Don't be fooled by this mod's name, it isn't just one outfit but an entire collection for female V. Statement jackets with bold skirts and boots, these outfits are little closer to modern-day clothing than those seen in the near future of 2077, but this only makes them stand out among the crowds even more.

Featuring fashionable and functional jackets, these looks are perfect for any Night City denizen looking to enjoy the neon fruits of the city, or even looking to take on bad guys while looking good doing so.

3 Doom Eternal Marauder Armor

Look Ready to Kick Demon Ass in this Doom Style Armor

  • Mod Link
  • Author: AAbdii

Everyone knows Doom , a game all about cutting through swathes of demons and hellish monsters to an absolutely amazing soundtrack that truly gets the blood pumping. It has hardly anything in common with Cyberpunk , both almost opposing completely in terms of visuals.

This didn't stop modder AAbdii over on Nexus mods, who decided they wanted to combine two great games together, granting V access to a truly cool armor set. They might not blend in well with the rest of Night City, but what a way to make a fashion statement, both awesome as hell, and terrifying to boot. Any enemy coming across V while dressed in this armor is truly going to be quaking in their cybernetics.

4 Lucy Edgerunners Jacket Archive XL

Complete The Lucy Look With The Jacket

  • Mod Link
  • Author: EzioMaverick

With Lucy's suit available as a mod from Netflix's hit anime show based on the game, players can complete their Lucy Look by also wearing her jacket. It was undeniable that the Edgerunner had style in the show, which thanks to the modding community, is now available to fans of the game.

All fans need to do to avail themselves of it is download the mod, and then it will be available to them, leaving them ready to take on Night City and its dangers.

5 Wraith's Hood With Hair

Adds A Cool Looking Hood Without Sacrificing Hair

  • Mod Link
  • Author: Echorra

If players are saddened by the lack of cool hoods in the game or wish the headwear didn't hide the hair they painstakingly crafted in the customization menu, then the Wraith's Hood mod is just the one for them.

Not only does it add a cool-looking hood that makes the perfect accessory for a Night City spy, but it also displays some hair, using all the color swatches of the game. This way, they can still display their neon pink or acid green locks while rocking this hood.

6 Quiet Outfit And Hair

Dress Up As The Silent Sniper From The Hit Stealth Series

  • Mod Link
  • Author: AlvarixPT

Fans of Cyberpunk and Metal Gear Solid rejoice--there is now a mod that combines the two. MGS5 introduced players to Quiet, a sniper with deadly aim who joins Snake and co, becoming an ally he can take with him on missions. One of the most striking things about her appearance was her outfit, which saw her donning a black bikini, ripped tights, combat boots, and some tactical harnesses, as she is cursed with a condition that means she breathes through her skin.

Fans of the look are now free to don their Fem V in this outfit, making them ready to sharpshoot their way through Night City. All they need to do is download the Quiet Outfit and Hair and all the other associated mods.

7 Takemura Cyberware Pack

More Cyberware For Male And Female V

  • Mod Link (Male) & Mod Link (Female)
  • Author: HADESXNEXUS

Takemura is undoubtedly one of the more snazzy residents in Night City, his clothes are cool and casual, and some amazing cyberware around his neck completes his look. Players who have always looked upon his cyberware with envy no longer need to be envious, as with this Takemura Cyberware mod, they can deck out their player character with the exact same gear.

What's more, there is a mod for both male and female V, so that no one is left out in the cold.

8 Black Durable Synthetic Biker Coat

Players Can Sport A Practical Jacket For Those Long Bike Rides

  • Mod Link
  • Author: Eye of Center

Occasionally Cyberpunk 2077 proves to have some solid fashion choices for the players to avail themselves of, and one such article is the synthetic biker coat, a long and durable leather jacket with some of the black leather fading to a shade of brown. It's unclear if this is a design choice or if the coat showing some wear and tear, but it does downgrade the overall look of the jacket.

Thankfully, the Black Durable Synthetic Biker Coat mod fixes this issue, ensuring that the coat is black all the way through. Now, the jacket is one stylish and uniform color, a much-needed improvement on the original.

9 Lucy Edgerunners Suit

Adds The Iconic Game Suit From The Anime

  • Mod Link
  • Author: EzioMaverick

Fans of Cyberpunk will already be aware of the anime that was released on Netflix in late summer 2022, telling the story of a boy struggling beneath the oppressive yoke of Night City, and his exploits alongside the other Edgerunner mercenaries. One of the main characters was a hacker called Lucy who developed a touching romance with David and was one of the more fashionable members of the party with her iconic bodysuit.

The modding community was kind enough to create the Lucy Edgerunners Suit mod that allows players to download and add to their own game so that they can enjoy Lucy's fashion statement on their own character.

10 Rocker Girl Atelier

Adds A Stylish Edge To V's Wardrobe With A Whole Shop's Worth Of Clothes

  • Mod Link
  • Author: Zwei

Leather clothes are extremely common in Night City, with plenty of jackets and pants available for V to purchase from vendors or discover themselves scattered across the world, but few are as exciting as the Rocker Girl Clothes mod.

This mod allows V to tap into their wild set, coming with leather skirts, shorts, jackets, boots, and body harnesses, making them look like a true rock chick ready to shred on the stage--or hunt and kill Cyberpsychos.

11 Chic Dress

Helps Bring Some Much Needed Elegance To Night City

  • Mod Link
  • Author: Hyst

Some Cyberpunk players might be looking to jazz their V up in something a little more glamorous. While there are some fancier attire they can avail themselves of in-game, there are several mods that also add some elegance to Night City, and the Chic Dress mod is just one of them.

This mod adds a daringly short dress that comes in a variety of colors, including red, black, blue, and a dazzling silver sequin pattern. With this dress, players are ready to paint Night City red.

12 Skirt - Archive XL

Adds Much-Needed Skirt Variety

  • Mod Link
  • Author: Hyst

Why should female V's be relegated to a life in all manner of unflattering trousers? Those who agree with this question would be best to refer to the modding community to look for better fashion alternatives, which they are sure to find with the Skirt Archive XL mod.

The skirts that are in the vanilla game are lacking to non-existent, but downloading this mod would change that, adding in a total of 20 skirts. The skirts come in five colors, two fabrics, and two lengths, allowing players to choose from mini to midi, matte, or gloss. What's more, it is compatible with some of the body shape mods allowing players more fashion freedom with their V.

13 Black Racing Gear

A Simple But Necessary Palette Swap

  • Mod Link
  • Author: ErebusEquity

"Does it come in black?" is a question most people find themselves asking about cars, mobile phones, shoes, accessories, and of course, clothes. But when players gear up in the racing gear in Cyberpunk 2077 , they might find that the answer to that question is no, disappointedly.

But players can take matters into their own hands and change that to a yes thanks to the BRG - Black Racing Gear mod. This mod offers a simple but necessary palette swap, changing the color of the outfit from green to black, improving this cosmetic by miles. Now players, whether they are male or female, are ready to dominate the racing track.

14 Night Clothing City Swaps

Players Can Cosplay As Their Favorite NPCs

  • Mod Link
  • Author: JackTLP

It's no secret that a lot of the major and even minor NPCs players can meet across Night City have access to a better tailor than V does. They are often seen wearing clothes that are way more fashionable than what players can purchase or find, which could potentially inspire some envy in players. Thankfully, the modding community is here to answer the prayers of players.

The Night City Clothing Swaps mod allows players to deck out their characters in the outfits seen on some NPCs including Rogue, Kerry, Jackie, and more. Now players can be just as fashionable as the NPCs surrounding them.

15 Batgirl Outfit

Become The Hero Night City Needs

  • Mod Link
  • Author: AlvarixPT

Night City is a place rife with crime, so it is definitely deserving of a hero to stand up to corruption and save innocents. The modding community agreed with this notion, creating a Batgirl Outfit mod that players can download to mask their player character as one of the caped crusaders.

One simple download and players can change their female V to the legendary Batgirl, which seems to fit right into the nighttime neon landscape of Night City, especially when there are cyberpsychos to hunt down.

16 Jinguji Custom Atelier

An Entire Wardrobe Of Options

  • Mod Link
  • Author: Mahat

Cyberpunk players already know of the struggle to find nice clothing for their character, and the process of downloading multiple mods to increase their choices can be a cumbersome task and run the risk of causing the game to crash. The solution seems simple: one mod that adds multiple options, and thanks to the modding community on Nexus mods, this exists.

Called Jinguji Custom Atelier - Unique Clothes for Fem V, this mod doesn't come with a single article of clothing, but an entire wardrobe full of cosmetics players can deck their female V in. From high-fashion dresses to knee-length skirts to leather pants, there is something for everyone in this mod, as well as many options for shoes and belts so that V isn't lacking in the accessory department. This mod is a must for forward fashion thinkers.

17 Wingdeer Clothing Collection

Dress Up Or Down In Casual, Cool Clothes

  • Mod Link
  • Author: wingdeer

Another mod that unleashes an entire new closet for female V, saving players from downloading multiple mods instead unless they are looking for something a little more specific. This mod allows V to dress up their best in casual yet cool clothing.

The Wingdeer Clothing Collection mod adds 19 new sets of clothing for V in a wide range of colors, including jeans, high-waisted pencil skirts, leather jackets, denim shorts, mini dresses, and more. With this mod, V is guaranteed to have an outfit for any situation.

item.title: New York Times Connections Hints and Answers for #584 January 15, 2025
item.description:
Connections is here again with another collection of sixteen words to sort. If you are stuck on this puzzle, you are not alone; it is not an easy one to complete all on your own.

This article is designed to help out anyone who already knows how to play Connections , but just wants some help with today's puzzle. Inside this, you will find hints, spoilers, help with the categories, and more.

Words in the NYT Connections Puzzle #584 for January 15, 2025

The Connections puzzle for today contains the words: Peanut, Vehicle, Dirty, Robot, Shy, Big, Wet, Toad, Medium, Low, Perfect, Tool, Light, Mechanism, Dry, and Short.

Hints for the NYT Connections Puzzle

The sections below contain all sorts of helpful hints for this mobile puzzle game. To peer inside, click the Read More button below the header you want to see. Each section is covered up to keep you from spoiling too much just by scrolling.

item.title: New York Times Strands Hints and Answers for January 15, 2025
item.description:
Strands is a short, daily word puzzle game from the New York Times, the same company that purchased Wordle back in 2022. In order to play, you need to study the one clue, then attempt to figure out no only the theme, but all eight themed words as well. Then you need to spot them in the letter grid.

If you already know how to play Strands , but you are just so stuck on this one that there's no getting out on your own, this article can help. Inside, you will find general hints, spoilers for a couple of the words, or even the complete answer if you want it.

The NYT Games Strands Puzzle #318 January 15, 2025

The Strands puzzle for today has nine things to find: the Spangram and the eight themed words. The clue for this one is Thar She Blows!

New York Times Games Strands Clues

Searching for some spoiler-free help for this innovative puzzle game? Inside each of the sections below is a single clue that will get you closer to the theme of this puzzle game. Open them up with the Read More button below each header.

General Hint 1

General Hint 2

General Hint 3

Spoilers for Two of the Words in Today's Strands

Each of the two sections below contains a single spoiler. If you open these up and peek inside, you will also get to see a screenshot of where that word goes inside the puzzle's letter grid.

Spoiler 1

Spoiler 2

The Answer to Today's New York Times Games Strands

Need the whole answer for this relaxing puzzle game? In the section below, you can see all the themed words, the Spangram, and a screenshot of where to put them all. Fair warning: don't open up this section unless you want to have the whole puzzle spoiled.

Today's Strands Explained

Inside the section below is an explanation for this mobile puzzle game. If you don't understand it even after completing it, look below to see how the theme, the themed words, and the clue all fit together and make sense.

Want to play? Check out the New York Times Games Strands website available on almost any device with a browser.
